home.title: Hello, I'm Ismail Han

home.description: I develop creative solutions with modern web technologies. I create projects that prioritize user experience with Vue.js, TypeScript, and other modern tools.

about.title: About Me
about.content:
Hello! I'm Ä°smail Han, a passionate software developer. I love creating user-friendly and performant applications with modern web technologies.

I work with modern frameworks like Vue.js, React, and TypeScript. On the backend side, I develop APIs using Node.js, Express, Python, and Go.

I have experience in database management with MongoDB and PostgreSQL. I enjoy working on Linux systems and following DevOps processes.

I'm eager to learn new technologies and contribute to open-source projects.
